name: H.E.L.P-Anti Ghost Brigade
description:
Install instructions

This game was made during the Brackeys 2022.2 game jam which had the theme : "You're not alone".  

In this game you have been hired to chase the ghosts in a haunted house. As you're the best anti-ghost company : "H.E.L.P.".  and the new owner wants to finally be alone by removing ghosts from his house ! To do so you have to do loops around the ghosts to catch them !  

Try to clean the house the fastest possible ! 

Have fun !
